txt.en: Herubrand is in the cellar of the farmhouse.\n\nHe needs to know what has occurred in the tavern.

'Calin proved his loyalty, and has not left my side. At first, I thought he stayed close to keep his eye on me, but I have found he is simply dedicated to me. He is a good man, and I see why my father liked him.\n\n'Calin came to me a few minutes ago looking nervous. Arnwi invited Calin for a drink at the nearby tavern, which seems harmless, but Calin wouldn't be worried for nothing. Please accompany Calin to help calm his nerves.'

'Thank you for agreeing to come with me. I believe Arnwi simply wants to catch up after being out of touch for some time, but something just did not seem right. I feel more comfortable having you come with me.\n\n'We will leave as soon as you are ready to depart.'
Calin is nervous about an unusual invitation for a drink with Arnwi, who has been out of touch for some time. Calin may be overly cautious, but a lot has happened lately to put him on edge.

'That rotten traitor! Why would Arnwi do such a thing? I wonder if he has been working against me this entire time. He coordinated that attack, and showed that he is working with the Dunlending ruffians.\n\n'I am a fool for not seeing it earlier. The Dunlendings have been the source of trouble brewing here. Was I blinded by my mixed heritage, and my view of them being brothers?'
Accompany Calin to the nearby tavern, where he has arranged to have a drink and catch up with Arnwi.
